explains: v. 得分；记下，记分；评分，打分数；分值是，得……分；获得胜利；刻痕；弄到毒品；检测并记录（菌落等）数量（score 的现在分词）
wordGroup: scoring system 划线系统；计分方法
scoring method 计分法，评分法

sentences.en: He was just inches away from scoring.
sentences.cn: 他只差一点儿就得分了。

sentences.en: Brondello secured the MVP award by scoring 357 points.
sentences.cn: 布朗德罗以357分的得分获得最有价值球员奖。

sentences.en: Colorado rose to the occasion with four players scoring 16 points or more.
sentences.cn: 科罗拉多队从容应对，4个队员赢得16分或更多得分。
